solution_line_template: Two white socks cost {price_difference} cents more than a single brown sock, meaning a brown sock is sold at ${two_white_cost}-${price_difference}=${brown_sock_cost}
The cost of buying {num_brown_socks} brown socks is {num_brown_socks}*${brown_sock_cost}=$<<{num_brown_socks}*{brown_sock_cost}={total_brown_cost}>>{total_brown_cost}
